ReviewList.Text: Added to our regular home school curriculum, this book helped a great deal with our dyslexic student. Highly recommend for helping kids who have learning disabilities.

I found this book really good. My young nephew was having trouble with his tables and it has really helped him.  I have found that the repetition and the uncluttered lay out of this learning aid makes memorizing the multiplication tables that much easier. This book delivers exactly what it says in its description: learning multiplication tables is all about repetition and more repetition for eventual instant recall. The tests and challenge sections are ideal for a grown up to sit with the child and help them by playing along with them.  I am glad that I bought this book, it has been a great help.
Extremely simple and useful for small children.  Best of all is how well it works on an ipad.  Nice to mix technology with an old classic method of learning.  Love it.

Although I understand how this book will help children with the repetition of doing their times tables, I believe people might be better off buying a set of actual flashcards. I do like the fact that kids could have this book on their e-reader to take with them at all times so they can get to know their times tables. This book is plain and simple and gets to the point of learning in a way that is sometimes the best, nothing distracts from the actual times tables this way.
I only now 1 Times now I now more Times and I am in first grade I don't know a lot
This was totally useless and not at all different from the way kids are already taught in school.  It preaches memorization without any "tricks" to help.  Waste of my time.
Okay, but very repetitive. Great for younger kids

What you see on the cove  IS NOT what you get, it is simply the numbers only in no color, small print, regular font, how on earth will this teach them a thing!  SO BORING AND DECEIVING.  I WISH I COULD GET MY MONEY BACK1
or why it is supposed to help your kids learn their times tables. It is basically a book of flash cards only with more wasted space. Weird!
